male.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいな
male.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

female.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいね
female.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

dialogue.sjis: 楽シイ デスカ？ 私ニハ ソウイッタ感情ハ アリマセン
dialogue.ascii: Fun, You Say? I Do Not Possess The Capability Of Experiencing Human Emotions.

male.sjis: そっか、楽しくないのか じゃ、つまんないよな なんか、さびしいなぁ
male.ascii: Oh yeah, you can't feel fun Gee, that kind of sucked Doesn't that bother you?

female.sjis: そっか、楽しくないのか じゃ、つまんないよね なんか、さびしいなぁ
female.ascii: Oh yeah, you can't feel fun Gee, that's too terrible Doesn't that bother you?

dialogue.sjis: イイエ 私ニハ 感情ガ アリマセンカラ ツマラナイワケデモアリマセン
dialogue.ascii: Not At All. I Cannot Express Emotions, So I Cannot Feel Frustration Either.

male.sjis: 楽しくもなく、つまらなくもない それって昔、親方に聞いたことあるぞ ムガのキョクチってやつだ
male.ascii: You can't feel joy, nor anger too I think Master said something about the pure devotion thing

female.sjis: 楽しくもなく、つまらなくもない それって昔、親方に聞いたことあるよ ムガのキョクチってやつでしょ
female.ascii: You can't feel joy, nor anger too I think Master said something about the pure devotion thing

dialogue.sjis: 無我ノ極致 デスカ タシカニ 作業中ニ 他ノコトヲ 考エルコトハ アリマセンガ
dialogue.ascii: Being Purely Devoted, You Say? Indeed, I Always Dedicate Myself To My Duties Above All Else.

male.sjis: すげぇな、 かっこいいぞ
male.ascii: You're so diligent, ! And that makes you super cool in your own way!

female.sjis: すごいね、 かっこいい！
female.ascii: You're so diligent, ! And that makes you super cool in your own way!

dialogue.sjis: カッコイイ デスカ ソウ言ワレルト 何故ダカ うおっしゃー液ガ 出テキマス
dialogue.ascii: So You Have Considered Me Cool ERROR, Washing Fluid Is Leaking From My Windshield

dialogue.sjis: それって、きっと うれしいんだよ
dialogue.ascii: I do, because I feel happy with you by my side, after all

male.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいな
male.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

female.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいね
female.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

dialogue.sjis: そうじゃな 作った武器を鍛え 自らのウデも鍛える
dialogue.ascii: Verily so! Continuing to hone your weapons and skills is essential, after all

dialogue.sjis: 鍛冶師としてこんなに楽しいことは ないじゃろうな
dialogue.ascii: And those are a delight for Craftknights to do, no?

male.sjis: お、も結構 わかってきたみたいだな
male.ascii: Nice one, ! Now you fully get how I feel as a Craftknight!

female.sjis: なによ、も結構 わかってきたみたいじゃない
female.ascii: Am I hearing you correctly, !? Now you fully get how I feel as a Craftknight!

dialogue.sjis: 何を言うか！ ワガハイはおぬしよりずっと長く 人生の修行を続けておるのじゃぞ
dialogue.ascii: Don't you jest with me! I've disciplined myself in all walks of life far longer than you have!

dialogue.sjis: そんなことはとっくの昔にわかっておる 今までおぬしが気付かなかった だけじゃ！
dialogue.ascii: And I have known so in all of my long life! It is you who needs to pay better attention to their kin!

male.sjis: そ、そうか 悪い悪い
male.ascii: I-Is that so!? My bad, my bad

female.sjis: そ、そうなの ゴメンゴメン
female.ascii: I-Is that so!? My bad, my bad

dialogue.sjis: それどころかワガハイは もっと楽しいことを 知っておるぞ
dialogue.ascii: Moreso, I have come to know of one thing I see as fun more than any other

male.sjis: なんだよ、それ？ 気になるなぁ
male.ascii: And that is? Tell me! I have to know!

female.sjis: なによ、それ？ 気になるなぁ
female.ascii: And that is? Tell me! I have to know!

dialogue.sjis: そいつはの おぬしの成長していく姿を みることじゃ
dialogue.ascii: That is Enduring every hardship, together with you

dialogue.sjis: これからもシッカリ修行をして 成長していくことで ワガハイを楽しませてくれよ
dialogue.ascii: Ensure that you work harder, and improve your strength. Seeing you grow as a person delights me most.

male.sjis: よっしゃ！ オレ、がんばるぜ！
male.ascii: Then I will! I'm gonna work even harder, for sure!

female.sjis: よぉし！ わたし、がんばるね！
female.ascii: Then I will! I'm gonna work even harder, for sure!

male.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいな
male.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

female.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいね
female.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

dialogue.sjis: 楽しい、だと？ どこが？ メンドウなだけだ
dialogue.ascii: You call this fun? Where did you even get that idea? If anything, this is so bothersome.

dialogue.sjis: そんなことないよ 前よりいい武器ができたり 強い相手と戦ったり
dialogue.ascii: C'mon, lighten up a bit! What about the time we crafted good weapons!? Or when we fought strong rivals?

male.sjis: それにといっしょに 修行できるっていうのは すっごく楽しいぜ
male.ascii: Besides, training together with you has been the most fun we had! Admit it, !

female.sjis: それにといっしょに 修行できるっていうのは すっごく楽しいよ
female.ascii: Besides, training together with you has been the most fun we had! Come on, !

dialogue.sjis: くっ！ キサマは、よくもそんなコトを 真顔で
dialogue.ascii: Gah! How can you manage saying lots of sappy crap with a straight face!?

male.sjis: なんだよ？ お前はオレと修行するの そんなイヤなのか？
male.ascii: What's with you!? Do you really hate training together with me that much?

female.sjis: なによ？ あなたはわたしと修行するの そんなイヤなの？
female.ascii: What's with you!? Do you really hate training together with me that much?

dialogue.sjis: なっ！ そういうことではないが
dialogue.ascii: What!? No! That's not what I meant

male.sjis: じゃあいいじゃないか？ 楽しいってことで な？
male.ascii: So you're not gonna admit it? I know you really had fun with me Don't you?

female.sjis: じゃあいいじゃない？ 楽しいってことで ね？
female.ascii: So you're not gonna admit it? I know you really had fun with me Don't you?

dialogue.sjis: ちっ もういい、好きにしろ！
dialogue.ascii: Tsk Enough! Do whatever you want!

dialogue.sjis: やった！
dialogue.ascii: Yay, you admitted it!

male.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいな
male.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

female.sjis: やっぱ修行は楽しいね
female.ascii: Training sure is fun! Don't you agree, ?

dialogue.sjis: そうですね 材料を集めて次は何をしようかって 考えるだけで、楽しくなりますわ
dialogue.ascii: I must agree it is. I just love putting the materials we've gathered to good use

male.sjis: いいこと言うなぁ さすがは オレのパートナーだぜ
male.ascii: You didn't need to sugarcoat Though I'm really grateful that you're my partner, .

female.sjis: いいこと言うなぁ さすがは わたしのパートナーだよ
female.ascii: You didn't need to sugarcoat Though I'm really grateful that you're my partner, .

dialogue.sjis: そんな でも本当は、それより楽しいことが あるんです
dialogue.ascii: Goodness But I must say, there is something else that brings me greater joy.

dialogue.sjis: なにそれ？
dialogue.ascii: And that is?

dialogue.sjis: それはですね さんといっしょに いることです
dialogue.ascii: That is Still being together with you,

male.sjis: な、なんだよ、 テレるなぁ
male.ascii: Y-you really think so, ? Damn, this is embarassing

female.sjis: な、なによ、 テレるじゃない
female.ascii: Y-you really think so, ? Gosh, this is embarassing

dialogue.sjis: さんは見てるだけで とっても面白くて 本当にあきませんわ
dialogue.ascii: Observing what you do as a Craftknight is very fun for me At least, I think so

dialogue.sjis: 面白い？
dialogue.ascii: You really think that's fun?

dialogue.sjis: はい！ とっても面白いです ほら、今だって見てるだけで うふふ
dialogue.ascii: Indeed, it is! See, I've even kept watch over you right now! Heehee

male.sjis: なんか、ほめられてるのか ビミョウになってきたぞ
male.ascii: Wait, are you complimenting me? That sounded kinda awkward

female.sjis: なんか、ほめられてるのか ビミョウになってきたよ
female.ascii: Wait, are you complimenting me? That sounded kinda awkward

male.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよな？
male.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

female.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよね？
female.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

dialogue.sjis: 当タリ前デス みゅーの様ヲ オ守リスルノガ 私ノ使命デスカラ
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative. Protecting Lady Murno Has Always Been My Primary Objective

male.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配だろ？
male.ascii: Is that so? You must be worried for her

female.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配だね？
female.ascii: Is that so? You must be worried for her

dialogue.sjis: 現在 みゅーの様ヲ 狙ウ者モ イナイト思ワレマスカラ 比較的 安全ナ状態ダト 判断シマス
dialogue.ascii: At Present, No One Is Targeting Lady Murno. I Conclude Her Safety Levels As Relatively High.

dialogue.sjis: うぇるまん様の戦闘力デモ 十分 ミューノ様ヲ オ守リスルコトガ 可能デショウ
dialogue.ascii: Master Wellman Has Sufficient Combat Prowess To Be Able To Continue Protecting Milady.

male.sjis: 戦闘力って ウェルマンさんって、強いのか？
male.ascii: His combat prowess? Wait, Wellman knows how to fight!?

female.sjis: 戦闘力って ウェルマンさんって、強いの？
female.ascii: His combat prowess? Wait, Wellman can fight!?

dialogue.sjis: 何度カ 練習試合ヲ シマシタガ ご※ぁんノ魔石ヲ守ル者トシテ必要ナ 戦闘技術ハ 身ニツケテイルヨウデス
dialogue.ascii: It Is Necessary For Protectors of G※van's Demon Stone To Enhance Their Combat Skills When Possible.

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマンさんとの 練習試合って 想像できない
dialogue.ascii: So that meant you and Wellman would often practice sparring together? Somehow, that's hard to believe

dialogue.sjis: トニカク 現状ハ みゅーの様ヨリ アナタノ方ガ 日常的ニ 危険ニサラサレテイマス
dialogue.ascii: Case In Point, It Is You Who Is More Vulnerable To Danger Than Lady Murno Currently.

dialogue.sjis: ソノ原因ト思ワレル アナタ自身ノ 無計画ナ行動ガ 改善サレルマデ コチラニイタ方ガイイト 判断シマス
dialogue.ascii: I Calculated That The Current Best Course Of Action Is To Guard You Until You Remedy Your Recklessness.

male.sjis: な、なんか オレが心配されている？
male.ascii: I-I see Could it be that you're actually worried about me?

female.sjis: な、なんか わたしが心配されている？
female.ascii: I-I see Could it be that you're actually worried about me?

male.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよな？
male.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

female.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよね？
female.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

dialogue.sjis: 当然じゃ 今でもミューノを守ることが ワガハイの使命じゃと思っておる
dialogue.ascii: Verily so! Protecting Murno is still my main priority, just so you know.

male.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配だろ？
male.ascii: Is that so? Are you still worried for her?

female.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配だね？
female.ascii: Is that so? Are you still worried for her?

dialogue.sjis: たしかにはなれておるからの 心配になることもあるが ウェルマン殿がついているからの
dialogue.ascii: Indeed, since I'm no longer staying with Murno, but Lord Wellman has been guarding her in my stead.

dialogue.sjis: まあ安心じゃろうて
dialogue.ascii: That said, I am perfectly confident she's in safe hands.

dialogue.sjis: でも、まだあの辺りも はぐれ召喚獣がいなくなったワケ じゃないし
dialogue.ascii: Butisn't her home is still infested with Strays?

dialogue.sjis: そうじゃが ウェルマン殿を手こずらせるような 召喚獣はそうもおるまいて
dialogue.ascii: Your point stand true, however Lord Wellman can should easily handle the Strays on his own.

male.sjis: え？ ウェルマンさんって、強いのか？
male.ascii: Huh? Wait, Wellman can fight!?

female.sjis: え？ ウェルマンさんって、強いの？
female.ascii: Huh? Wait, Wellman can fight!?

dialogue.sjis: うむ ゴヴァンの魔石を守る者として それなりの修行はしているようじゃ
dialogue.ascii: Indeed Protectors of Govan's Stone must rigorously train in combat.

dialogue.sjis: 何度が組み手の相手をしたが なかなかの強さじゃったぞ
dialogue.ascii: I've sparred with him a lot, and I must say he is quite the formidable opponent

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマンさんとの 組み手って 想像できない
dialogue.ascii: So that meant you and Wellman would often practice sparring together? Somehow, that's hard to believe

dialogue.sjis: じゃから今はミューノより おぬしのそばにいた方が ワガハイの出番があるのじゃ
dialogue.ascii: Therefore! It is you who I should guard, and not Murno, currently!

male.sjis: な、なんか オレってまだまだってこと？
male.ascii: O-Okay? Why do I feel like you're kind of looking down on me, though?

female.sjis: な、なんか わたしってまだまだってこと？
female.ascii: O-Okay? Why do I feel like you're kind of looking down on me, though?

male.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよな？
male.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

female.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよね？
female.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

dialogue.sjis: ふ、ふざけるな！ 誰があいつのことなど
dialogue.ascii: H-Hell if I know! Just who would waste their time worrying about other people!?

male.sjis: ああ やっぱ心配なんだな
male.ascii: Oooh So you really ARE concerned for Munro!

female.sjis: ああ やっぱ心配なんだ
female.ascii: Oooh So you really ARE concerned for Munro!

bigtext.ascii: Don't act as if you can read my mind!

dialogue.sjis: 今のあいつにはウェルマンが ついているんだ どうして私が心配する必要がある？
dialogue.ascii: Murno has Wellman with her now, so why should I concern myself?

dialogue.sjis: でも、まだあの辺りも はぐれ召喚獣がいなくなったワケ じゃないし
dialogue.ascii: Butisn't her home is still infested with Strays?

dialogue.sjis: そんなもの、ウェルマンのやつが どうとでもする！
dialogue.ascii: So? Wellman can handle them all on his own, anyway.

male.sjis: え？ もしかして ウェルマンさんって、強いのか？
male.ascii: Huh? So that means Wait, Wellman can fight!?

female.sjis: え？ もしかして ウェルマンさんって、強いの？
female.ascii: Huh? So that means Wait, Wellman can fight!?

dialogue.sjis: キサマ、気がつかなかったのか？ ゴヴァンの遺跡を守る者として あいつは相当に鍛えているぞ
dialogue.ascii: Can't you at least guess why? It's a given that protectors of the ruins must undergo strict training!

dialogue.sjis: 組み手の相手にこの私を 指名してきたこともあるくらいだ
dialogue.ascii: That man would have me as his sparring partner back then.

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマンさんとの 組み手って 想像できない
dialogue.ascii: So that meant you and Wellman would often practice sparring together? Somehow, that's hard to believe

dialogue.sjis: そんなくだらないことを 考えてばかりいるから 私の苦労が絶えないのだ
dialogue.ascii: See, you can't even think for yourself or safety either! You're giving me lots of gray hairs

male.sjis: なんか、オレ ミューノより心配されてる？
male.ascii: I-I see Why do I feel that you're really more worried for Murno right now?

female.sjis: なんか、わたし ミューノより心配されてる？
female.ascii: I-I see Why do I feel that you're really more worried for Murno right now?

male.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよな？
male.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

female.sjis: やっぱは ミューノのことが気になるよね？
female.ascii: Hey, Are you wondering how is Murno doing right now?

dialogue.sjis: 当たり前ですわ！ 今でもミューノ様をお守りすることは 私の使命ですから
dialogue.ascii: Of course, I am! Protecting Lady Murno has always been a main part of my duties!

male.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配だろ？
male.ascii: Is that so? You must be worried for her

female.sjis: そっか じゃあ、心配でしょ？
female.ascii: Is that so? You must be worried for her

dialogue.sjis: たしかにはなればなれだと 心配になることもありますけど ウェルマン様がついていますから
dialogue.ascii: Of course, and I still do But Master Wellman is protecting Milady in my stead, so

dialogue.sjis: きっと大丈夫ですわ
dialogue.ascii: I'm sure they'll both be alright!

dialogue.sjis: でも、まだあの辺りも はぐれ召喚獣がいなくなったワケ じゃないし
dialogue.ascii: Butisn't her home is still infested with Strays?

dialogue.sjis: そうですけど ウェルマン様がついていれば よっぽどの相手でなければ
dialogue.ascii: Indeed, that is still a problem But Master Wellman can manage on his own, even against a mighty foe.

male.sjis: え？ もしかして ウェルマンさんって、強いのか？
male.ascii: Huh? So that means Wait, Wellman can fight!?

female.sjis: え？ もしかして ウェルマンさんって、強いの？
female.ascii: Huh? So that means Wait, Wellman can fight!?

dialogue.sjis: はい ゴヴァンの魔石を守る者として 結構修行をしているみたいですよ
dialogue.ascii: Yes! Protectors of Govan's Stone must train hard in combat, after all.

dialogue.sjis: 何度が組み手の相手をしましたけど なかなか強かったですわ
dialogue.ascii: I used to be his sparring partner, and goodness, he's so tough!

dialogue.sjis: ウェルマンさんとの 組み手って 想像できない
dialogue.ascii: So that meant you and Wellman would often practice sparring together? Somehow, that's hard to believe

dialogue.sjis: だからどちらかというと すぐにムチャなことばかりする さんの方が
dialogue.ascii: You, on the other hand, are more reckless than Milady! Goodness, !

dialogue.sjis: ミューノより心配されてる？
dialogue.ascii: And whatever happened to being worried for Murno?

male.sjis: そういえば、って リィンバウムに召喚される前は 何やってたんだ？
male.ascii: Oh yeah, ! What was your life like before you were summoned to Lyndbaum?

female.sjis: そういえば、って リィンバウムに召喚される前は 何やってたの？
female.ascii: Oh yeah, ! What was your life like before you were summoned to Lyndbaum?

dialogue.sjis: 重要施設ノ 防衛デス
dialogue.ascii: I Was Tasked With Guarding Important Facilities On Loreilal.

male.sjis: 重要シセツか なんだかスゴそうだな 何を守ってたんだ？
male.ascii: Important facilities? That sounds kinda coolWhat exactly were you guarding, anyway?

female.sjis: 重要シセツか なんだかスゴそうだね 何を守ってたの？
female.ascii: Important facilities? That sounds kinda coolWhat exactly were you guarding, anyway?

dialogue.sjis: ソレハ 機密事項デス
dialogue.ascii: That Is Classified Information.

dialogue.sjis: え〜っと 話せないってこと
dialogue.ascii: Ermm So are you not gonna talk about it, or?

dialogue.sjis: ソノ通リデス
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative.

male.sjis: ほほ〜、ヒミツとはね〜 すごく大事なもんなんだな だから守ってたんだ
male.ascii: Oho, I smell a juicy secret! It must've been REALLY important if you're so defensive about it!

female.sjis: ほほ〜、ヒミツとはね〜 すごく大事なものなんだね だから守ってたんだ
female.ascii: Oho, I smell a juicy secret! It must've been REALLY important if you're so defensive about it!

dialogue.sjis: 機密事項デス
dialogue.ascii: I Repeat, That Is Classified Information.

dialogue.sjis: で、それを狙う相手と 日夜はげしい戦いが 繰り広げられたワケだ
dialogue.ascii: So it must be really so classified that anyone would attempt to silence who aren't meant to know

dialogue.sjis: イイエ アマリ敵ハ 来マセンデシタ
dialogue.ascii: That Is Incorrect. Enemies Have Not Targeted Them.

male.sjis: は？ じゃあ、何してたんだ？
male.ascii: Huh? Then what EXACTLY is it?

female.sjis: は？ じゃあ、何してたの？
female.ascii: Huh? Then what EXACTLY is it?

dialogue.sjis: 基本的ニハ 待機ヲシテイマシタ
dialogue.ascii: To Be More Precise, I Was Set On STANDBY Mode.

dialogue.sjis: 待機って おとなしくしてたってこと？
dialogue.ascii: You were set to Standby? Does that mean you were unable to talk, or anything at all?

dialogue.sjis: ハイ
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative.

dialogue.sjis: １日中ずーっと？
dialogue.ascii: Like, the ENTIRE time!?

dialogue.sjis: ズーット
dialogue.ascii: Affirmative.

male.sjis: スゴイ、さすがだ オレにはとても たえられそうにないぜ
male.ascii: Man, , you're so coolEven I wouldn't manage standing still for so long

female.sjis: スゴイ、さすがだ わたしにはとても たえられそうにないよ
female.ascii: Gee, , you're so coolEven I wouldn't manage standing still for so long

dialogue.sjis: そういえば、って １００年も生きたから トラマタになったんだよな？
dialogue.ascii: Oh yeah, ! You've lived for a 100 years, so you're basically a Toramata, right?

dialogue.sjis: どうしてそんなに長生きできたんだ？
dialogue.ascii: How'd you manage to live so long, anyway?

dialogue.sjis: そういえば、って １００年も生きたから トラマタになったんだよね？
dialogue.ascii: Oh yeah, ! You've lived for a 100 years, so you're basically a Toramata, right?

dialogue.sjis: どうしてそんなに長生きできたの？
dialogue.ascii: How'd you manage to live so long, anyway?

dialogue.sjis: そうじゃのう １００年間生きていたというより １００年間死ねなかったのじゃ
dialogue.ascii: You could put it that way Yet, it's moreso that I'm incapable of dying for a hundred years.

dialogue.sjis: 死ねなかった？ それってどういう
dialogue.ascii: So you can't die at all? What do you mean?

dialogue.sjis: いや、人をさがしておってな そいつに会うまでは死んでも 死にきれん
dialogue.ascii: That'sbecause I'm looking for a certain person. I'm unable to die until I meet that person again.

dialogue.sjis: そう思っておったら しらぬ間に１００年じゃ まさに光陰矢のごとし、じゃな
dialogue.ascii: And within the blink of an eye, a century has already passed Time does truly fly

dialogue.sjis: そんな １００年間もさがしてたって 生きてるの、その人？
dialogue.ascii: Oh, no But if you've searched for a 100 years, is that person still alive?

dialogue.sjis: どうかの？ さすがにもう生きてはいないと思うが なにせ変わった人間じゃったからな
dialogue.ascii: Perhaps I doubt so. That person was quite unusual, to put it

dialogue.sjis: もしかしたら
dialogue.ascii: So it's possible that

male.sjis: へぇ そんなに変わった人なのか 面白そうだな
male.ascii: Hm So there are people like the one you're finding. Interesting

female.sjis: へぇ そんなに変わった人なのか 面白そうだね
female.ascii: Hm So there are people like the one you're finding. Interesting

dialogue.sjis: ああ、面白い人間じゃった おぬしにも話してやりたいが 長くなりそうじゃからの
dialogue.ascii: Ah, but that human is a funny one! I'd love to tell you more, but I'm afraid we're wasting time

dialogue.sjis: いつか機会があったら じっくり聞かせてやるわ
dialogue.ascii: Once we have more free time on our hands, we can resume where I've left off.

male.sjis: うん！ 楽しみにしてるぜ
male.ascii: Yeah! I'm looking forward to that!

female.sjis: うん！ 楽しみにしてるね
female.ascii: Yay! I'm looking forward to that!

male.sjis: そういえば、って 昔っからそんな感じだったのか？
male.ascii: Oh yeah, ! Have you always been like that?

female.sjis: そういえば、って 昔っからそんな感じだったの？
female.ascii: Oh yeah, ! Have you always been like that?

dialogue.sjis: そんな感じ？ どういうイミだ
dialogue.ascii: Can't you elaborate properly? I don't follow you

dialogue.sjis: なんというか、失礼というか 無礼というか、感じ悪いというか
dialogue.ascii: Like, you know, you're always so grouchy? And rude? Anywayyou always act so mean all the time!

dialogue.sjis: なんだとキサマ！ なめた口をきくと、消すぞ！
dialogue.ascii: What did you just call me!? You're asking for it if you don't shut your mouth!

male.sjis: ほらほら、そういう感じ いっつも怒ってさ 昔からそうなのか？
male.ascii: See? You're being so mean again! I was only concerned, you know Were you always so confrontational?

female.sjis: ほらほら、そういう感じ いっつも怒ってさ 昔からそうなの？
female.ascii: See? You're being so mean again! I was only concerned, you know Were you always so confrontational?

dialogue.sjis: そんなことどうだっていいだろう！
dialogue.ascii: And I have nothing to say to you!

dialogue.sjis: よくないよ お前、口は悪いけど 根はいいヤツなんだからさ
dialogue.ascii: Hey, don't be like that I know you said lots of mean stuff, but you're a good guy deep down!

dialogue.sjis: もっとやさしくしていれば 友達たくさんできるハズだぜ そっちの方が楽しいだろ？
dialogue.ascii: If you acted nicer, I'm sure you'd have lots of friends! Doesn't that sound great?

dialogue.sjis: よくないよ あなた、口は悪いけど 根はいい人なんだからさ
dialogue.ascii: Hey, don't be like that I know you said lots of mean stuff, but you're a good guy deep down!

dialogue.sjis: もっとやさしくしていれば 友達たくさんできるハズだよ そっちの方が楽しいでしょ？
dialogue.ascii: If you acted nicer, I'm sure you'd have lots of friends! Doesn't that sound great?

dialogue.sjis: 友達ができて楽しい、だと 面白いことを言うな？ ではキサマには話してやろうか
dialogue.ascii: Having friends? Pft You THINK that's fun? Since you always whine, I'll tell you why

dialogue.sjis: 私がサプレスにいたころ その友達とやらがこの私から 全てをうばっていった話を
dialogue.ascii: Back when I used to be on Sapureth, The wretch I considered my friend took away everything I had

male.sjis: あ ごめん なんか、オレ
male.ascii: I Sorry I didn't know

female.sjis: あ ごめん なんか、わたし
female.ascii: I Sorry I didn't mean to

dialogue.sjis: く くく
dialogue.ascii: Pft Pfehehe

dialogue.sjis: え？ なんで？
dialogue.ascii: Huh? What's wrong?

dialogue.sjis: キサマ、今の話 信じかけていただろう
dialogue.ascii: Come on, did you seriously believe all that?

male.sjis: なんだよ！ ウソかよ！ ちっくしょー だまされた！
male.ascii: You're messed up! You liar! Daaammmiiiit! You fooled me!

female.sjis: なによ！ ウソなの！ だましたのね！ くやしー
female.ascii: You're messed up! You liar! You fooled me! Meanie!

dialogue.sjis: ふふ いつか私の気が向いたら 本当のことを教えてやるよ
dialogue.ascii: Heheh But really, I'll tell you soon. If I feel like it, that is.

male.sjis: くそう その時は絶対にダマされないぞ！
male.ascii: Dammit And I won't fall for your lies again by then!

female.sjis: もう その時は絶対にダマされないから！
female.ascii: Geez And I won't fall for your lies again by then!

male.sjis: そういえば、って お兄さんがいたって前に言ってたよな どんな人なんだ？
male.ascii: By the way, ! You mentioned you had a brother a while ago! What is he like?

female.sjis: そういえば、って お兄さんがいたって前に言ってたよね どんな人なの？
female.ascii: By the way, ! You mentioned you had a brother a while ago! What is he like?

dialogue.sjis: すっごくイジワルですわ いっつも私をコワがらせるような コトばかり、考えてるんです
dialogue.ascii: My brother is such a prankster! He always would come up with mean pranks to scare the life out of me!

dialogue.sjis: おまけに足がすっごく速くて 私が怒って追いかけても 絶対に追いつけなくて
dialogue.ascii: He's also quite athletic, so I always had a hard time chasing him down whenever he pranks me

male.sjis: それはなんか 大変な目にあってたんだな
male.ascii: I see He must be really special to you

female.sjis: それはなんか 大変な目にあってたんだね
female.ascii: I see He made you go through a lot, didn't he?

dialogue.sjis: ホントですよ！ ちょっとしたことですぐ怒るし 変なとこですっごいガンコだし
dialogue.ascii: Indeed, he did! He gets miffed over small things! And he had very weird fixations!

dialogue.sjis: 自分の信念は曲げないとか言って イヤなことは絶対やらないし おかげで私がいつも
dialogue.ascii: But he sticks to what he believes, never stooping to truly bad things! He shaped me into what I am now

dialogue.sjis: まあまあ、 落ちついて そんな怒らなくても
dialogue.ascii: Hey now, Calm down, okay? You don't need to get riled up now

dialogue.sjis: そうですね、すみません とにかく、あの兄についての話なら いくらでもありますから
dialogue.ascii: Indeed, my apologies. Anyhow, I'll tell you more about my brother when we have more time.

dialogue.sjis: 今度機会があったら ぜひ聞いてくださいね！
dialogue.ascii: I mean it, I have LOTS of things to Tell you about him! Don't be shy!

dialogue.sjis: わ、わかりました
dialogue.ascii: S-Sure thing, I will soon
